sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Our innovation lies in our "Tipping-First, Groups-Next" Lean MVP strategy combined with an uncompromising focus on Web3 UX refinement.

UX Focus as POC: Our initial MVP (Phase 1) is dedicated to proving that a Web3 social app can be as intuitive and aesthetically pleasing as its Web2 counterparts. This low-barrier-to-entry design is itself an innovation in the dApp space.

Tipping-as-RWA: We are utilizing existing native assets (ADA) for simple, immediate, permissionless value transfer. This direct on-chain payment bypasses the complexity of token standards and provides instant, tangible Real World Asset (RWA) value for creators—money they can use now, not tokens they might sell later.

Proven Traction (Proof of Concept): Krippt (formerly Nkrypt) is not a theoretical project. We have an established, functioning beta with:

500+ Registered Users (Pre-monetization)

1,200+ Pieces of Content

50+ Dedicated Beta Testers

This existing user base serves as the initial testing ground and proof of concept for the V2 features accessble on [https://nkrypt\.space](https://nkrypt.space)

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Our MVP will demonstrate a fully functional, mobile-first SocialFi experience featuring:

Phase 1 Demo (Proof of Concept): The new, professional brand identity, and the fluid, intuitive UI/UX for profiles and the content feed, proving we can deliver consumer-grade aesthetics.

Phase 2 Demo (Tipping): Seamless, on-chain ADA tipping using CIP-30 wallet standards. A user can connect their wallet and execute a tip that is immediately visible on the explorer.

Phase 3 Demo (Groups): Fully functional Krippt Clubs (Group Creation) demonstrating how niche communities can be organized, moderated, and managed—the foundation for future tokenized RWA governance.

The current beta (pre-V2 rebrand) is accessible on a private staging link. The final V2 Mainnet MVP will be launched at [https://app\.krippt\.io](https://app.krippt.io) (URL to be finalized during the rebrand).

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
The problem of limited creator monetization affects an estimated 100,000+ globally active creators who are dissatisfied with Web2 platform cuts (up to 50%). Krippt V2 directly addresses this multi-million dollar sector gap by providing an immediate, 0% platform fee solution.

The uniqueness and immediacy of the solution are grounded in its technical simplicity and focus:

Unique ADA Tipping Rail: We utilize existing, robust Plutus smart contracts and CIP-30 standards to ensure low-latency, high-reliability tipping. This avoids reliance on complex governance or newly minted tokens.

Groups as Community RWA: The Krippt Clubs are designed to be token-agnostic structures. They can be utilized immediately for social organization and are architected to easily integrate future RWA features, such as fractionalized group IP or specific Group Membership Tokens. The group itself is the first layer of a digital RWA.

Solutions Uniqueness and Feasibility:

Uniqueness: Prioritizing direct, low-friction ADA value transfer over complex SocialFi tokenomics, and leading with a superior UX.

Immediacy: The entire scope is achievable within 6 months due to the focused nature of the MVP, building on existing traction.

Feasibility: Built upon the established and functional Krippt beta codebase, reducing development risk by over 40%.

Technical Stack: React frontend (mobile-first), Node.js backend, Plutus (minimal smart contract for transaction orchestration), and leveraging existing Cardano dApp Connectors.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Cardano Network Activity

Krippt V2 is projected to generate 7,500+ new on-chain transactions (tips) within its first year. This establishes Cardano as a viable, low-cost platform for direct creator monetization and seamless peer-to-peer value transfer.



User Acquisition

With over 1,500 new active wallets engaging with decentralized applications, Krippt V2 will attract a significant wave of Web2 creators—especially from the SocialFi sector—who are seeking transparent, equitable, and high-yield monetization models.



RWA Foundation

By enabling the creation of 350+ decentralized community structures, Krippt V2 lays the foundational social and identity layer required for future Real-World Asset (RWA) initiatives. These communities will be primed for governance, co-ownership, and asset fractionalization.



Open Source Value

Krippt V2 will open-source its tipping and group-management modules, contributing production-ready, high-volume peer-to-peer interaction code to the Cardano developer community. This strengthens the ecosystem with reusable, scalable primitives for SocialFi and RWA use cases.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Our capability is grounded in a proven delivery history (the existing beta) and an operational, pre-funded product. The team is composed of seasoned engineers with direct experience in scalable Web3 infrastructure.

Trust and Accountability: We commit to delivering against all public milestones, providing bi-weekly updates via the platform, and maintaining an open-source GitHub repository for continuous review. Funds will be released only upon verifiable completion of each milestone.

Feasibility Validation: The core content sharing logic is already functioning, and the UX/UI blueprint (Phase 1) is ready. The main risk, the On-Chain Tipping Integration, will be validated by:

Testnet Deployment (Phase 2): Successful deployment and multi-wallet stress testing of the Tipping smart contract on the Cardano Testnet.

Closed Beta (Phase 3): A controlled release of the full MVP to our existing community of 50+ testers before Mainnet launch, ensuring real-world usability and bug resolution.

Our experience, passion, and commitment are highlighted by the fact that we have already built and maintained a user base and codebase prior to this proposal, demonstrating groundedness in delivery and a measurable track record.

sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Budget Breakdown (35,000 ADA Total Request)

Smart Contract & Backend Development — 16,000 ADA (45.7%)

This covers CTO compensation for building and auditing the Tipping Aiken smart contract and developing the Node.js backend logic for Groups (Milestones 2 and 3).

Frontend & UX/UI Refinement — 10,000 ADA (28.6%)

This funds the Dev Partner to execute the rebrand and deliver a high-quality, mobile-first V2 UI/UX, including support during Milestone 3.

Security & Infrastructure — 4,000 ADA (11.4%)

Includes cloud hosting, Testnet operations, and a third-party review/audit of the Tipping contract before it is deployed to Mainnet.

Marketing & Community Outreach — 3,000 ADA (8.6%)

Covers content creation, onboarding guides, and targeted community campaigns to drive early ADA tipping volume after launch.

Contingency Reserve — 2,000 ADA (5.7%)

A buffer for unforeseen technical complexities to ensure on-time delivery within the 6-month development window.

TOTAL — 35,000 ADA (100%)

This ensures full delivery of the Mainnet Tipping system and the Community MVP.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
The cost of 35,000 ADA represents exceptional value due to its direct path to tangible metrics, strong comparative analysis, and high impact-to-cost ratio:

Comparative Value & Differentiation (Competitive Analysis):

Versus Web2 (e.g., Twitter/X, Instagram): Krippt V2 offers 0% platform fees vs. the 30-50% cut taken by incumbents. This massive value proposition is the primary creator magnet.

Versus Other Cardano SocialFi: Most existing projects focus on token launches or are still in early alpha. Krippt V2 skips proprietary token complexity (initially) to deliver immediate ADA utility and has a superior, demonstrated UI/UX focus (Phase 1). Our existing 500+ users and content base give us a significant head start in organic growth.

Quantifiable Ecosystem Reach: For 35,000 ADA, Krippt V2 commits to delivering 7,500+ new on-chain transactions and attracting 4,000+ new active users within the first year. This is a powerful, quantified return on investment in terms of active usage and liquidity injection.

High Impact-to-Cost Ratio: We are not starting from zero; we are upgrading a functional beta. This efficiency allows us to dedicate 74.3% of the budget directly to the technical delivery of the Tipping and Group features (Smart Contract & Frontend). The investment is primarily in code implementation rather than exploratory R&D, maximizing the value derived from every ADA. The resulting platform establishes the critical social and identity layer required for other Cardano RWA projects to thrive.
